Description: Physiological impact. High: Fast, loud, intense. Low: Slow, soft, relaxing.
Emotional polarity. High: Happy, triumphant. Low: Sad, ominous, dark.
Sharpness/Clarity. High: Piercing, high-frequency focus. Low: Warm, muffled.
Predictability. High: Steady pulse/4-on-the-floor. Low: Syncopated, erratic.
Musical density. High: Many chords, jazz/classical. Low: 3-chord punk/minimal.
Atmosphere. High: Massive reverb, wide stereo. Low: Dry, intimate, mono.
Note shape. High: Staccato, plucked, aggressive. Low: Legato, flowing, soft.
Narrative focus. High: Singable 'hooks'. Low: Texture-based, no melody.
Evolution. High: Progressive journey, ever-changing. Low: Loop-based, hypnotic.
Source origin. High: Natural, human, organic. Low: Synthetic, mechanical, digital.
